section.heading: Establishment of the Office of Government Ethics.
section.text: There is established within the Board an Office of Government Ethics. The Office of Government Ethics shall be headed by the Director of Government Ethics, who shall report directly to the Board.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see ยง 1083(f) of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-434, July 30, 2018, 65 DCR 8200).
